title: Panic as Bitcoin crisis escalates as value plunges in half and crypto geeks see entire fortunes vanish… or worse

title: Bitcoin crashes to $60,000, losing half of its value in just four months - will it trigger a 'death spiral' for crypto?
description: While it has rebounded to trade at around $65,000 this morning, bitcoin has lost nearly half of its value in over four months, after it reached a record high of $122,000 in October.

title: Bitcoin Crashes as Crypto Investors Whine About People Making Fun of Them

title: Bitcoin Correction: Signals Suggest Downside Exhaustion
description: Bitcoin has undergone a sharp correction, with prices now trading below the estimated average cost of production for listed miners (around $74,600). While such drawdowns can be unsettling, several technical and on-chain indicators suggest that selling pressure may be nearing exhaustion. Global crypto ETPs recorded their highest daily trading volumes on record at $18.5B—a level [...]The post Bitcoin Correction: Signals Suggest Downside Exhaustion appeared first on ETF Trends.
